reporter_caption.center: MATTER OF GREEN v. McNAB, 60 N.Y.2d 600 (1983)

caption.center: In the Matter of CHARLES H. GREEN, Respondent, v. EVERETT F. McNAB et al.,
Constituting the Board of Elections of Suffolk County, and DANIEL MARTIN,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Appellate Division of the Supreme Court in the Second Judicial Department, THOMAS V. MALLON, J.Page 601
opinion.attorneys:
Thomas J. Spargo for appellant.
Herbert L. Haas for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed, without costs, for the reasons stated in the memorandum at the Appellate Division (96 A.D.2d 918).
Concur: Chief Judge COOKE and Judges JASEN, JONES, WACHTLER, MEYER and SIMONS.
